0: At this point my wife is nothing short of irate and goes downstairs to speak to the manager herself which is not characteristic of her typical demeanour and evidences just how frustrated she is
However the staff was apologetic and professional in handling the complaint
they charge for it but they waived the fee
There is a shower beside the bathtub although the shower is quite small as I tend to hit my elbows periodically on the walls or glass
They charge 12 for parking which is not great considering it is not in the core of downtown
This hotel is about 20min from downtown but it was very easy to get around with a car
Downtown is a half hour drive
Stephenie at the front desk moved me to another room immediately even thought the property was nearly at capacity
Check in went smoothly however I had prepaid my reservation in advance and confirmed with the front desk agent at check in that my card will only be authorized for incidentals
Key cards keep on demagnetises themselves
1: When I arrived they told me right away they did not have a king room so they offered me two double queen rooms and offered points on the reward program as well as complimentary breakfast
While the staff was very helpful in getting me ice it would be nice for the hotel to carry some basic first aid supplies for a small incident like mine
Though we only stayed here for a night it was definitely a wonderful stay
i stayed with you guys this month 2 weeks back
Very good but maid forgot to make up room second night
The toasted cheese we ordered in our room was just 2 slices of toast with 2 slices of cheese at an astronomical price
While they could not promise anything our room was ready for us when we arrived
2: Our room looked great I really loved the giant side wall window that you could see Toronto through
lots of great restaurants within a short drive and good food on premise
Convenient if you one needs a good hotel in this part of Toronto
The hotel entrance and lobby is exceptional check in was easy and our room was available early
The welcoming from the doorman Mathew was exceptional and started our 2 night stay off just right
Clean beautiful hotel with beautifully manicured gardens and great parking onsite
